articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT dawnkelly.eth (🧱, 🚀) 🏳️‍🌈
Thrilled to announce I accepted a developer advocate role with @protocollabs, specifically @Filecoin 
If you've followed this tech journey, you know what this announcement means to me. I now have a solid team with which to grow and will be able to support my little fam. LFG! 🚀

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Noah
Re @FrancescoCiull4 I 4x'd my income last year going from being a manager at a drive-thru to doing developer relations and technical writer.
The traditional software development world wouldn't give me a chance, but web3 employers saw that I was doing the work, and started paying me for it. 🙏

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Farza 🇺🇸 🇵🇰
I've met 100s of insane builders these last few weeks based in various places -- India, Brazil, Nigeria, and more.
Nearly all were in the middle of visa issues.
We're exploring this problem at @_buildspace.
True "digital citizens" shouldn't feel constrained by their passport.
